p: Modifications of UNA could be conducted to improve its pharmacological potential. In another work, derivatives of UNA generated by reaction with oxalyl chloride and various phenyl amines inhibited tumor necrosis factor-α (TNF-α)-induced nuclear factor-kappa B (NF-κB) activation of H460 human lung cancer cells, with values of IC 50 ranging from 0.94 to 15 µM [ 101]. Some UNA derivatives with substitution at the C-2 position suppressed the catalytic activity of baker’s yeast α-glucosidase (IC 50 from 0.71 to 10.32 µM), while the IC 50 values of ULA and UNA were 5.08 and 2.47 µM, respectively [ 102].
